fields.title: Junior Python Developer
fields.short_description: You will repair our toasters for the lowest salary ever
fields.text:
We need python developer for the rescue!

There are a lot of broken toasters, but we have no person to fix them. You will fix them for the lowest salary ever. You will be our hero!

fields.title: Senior Android Developer
fields.short_description: We are looking for a skilled Android developer
fields.text: This is a hands on role where you will be developing a native application for Android capable devices. The ideal candidate will be responsible for the technical design, development and implementation of the mobile product. You will work in a small team, so effective communication is essential. We will keep you challenged and learning while utilizing the full range of your skills.

fields.title: Junior Android Developer
fields.short_description: We are looking for Junior Android developer
fields.text: Our most critical asset at Symantec is the talent we hire - you! We look for people who have a desire to excel and reflect our values: Innovation, Action, Customer-Driven, and Trust. We recognize that every opening in our company is a chance to increase Symantec's competitive advantage, and we are willing to invest in you in order to win

fields.title: .Net developer
fields.text:
We need a hands-on .NET Developer / Software Developer (ASP.NET / C#) to join a rapidly expanding, friendly software house based in Central London. This role is primarily home based but developers are required to visit the office at regular intervals, at least once per month.

With major clients that include RBS, Symantec and HP this small software house are pioneers of user-centric service catalog, self-service portal and request automation solutions. They employ a highly experienced team who are at their best working with the latest technology on fast moving projects with clients based in the UK and across the world.

fields.title: .Net idiot
fields.short_description: Yes, I am not a fan of dotNet
fields.text: We want to make a job of .Net developer more dificult. Since we need a guy who will bother our dotNet developer a whole day long! Great salary guaranteed
